hanzi-su-wiki:
柄

Значения

Рукоятка; узор, телосложение, характер, власть, сила

Мнемоника

Деревянная 木 ручка, помогающая уберечь ладони от огня 丙.
purpleculture_pinyin:
bǐng
handle or shaft (of an axe etc); (of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem; sth that affords an advantage to an opponent; classifier for knives or blades
рукоять или древко (топора и т. д.); (цветка, листа или плода) стебель; что дает преимущество противнику; классификатор для ножей или лезвий
rtega_mnemonic:
柄柄RShandle, lever, knob, authority, design, pattern
  • piece of wood 木 inside the house 丙: either it's a handle of the door or something with a nice design produced by an authority in the arts
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 丙 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
把柄 [ bǎ bǐng ]: handle; (fig.) information that can be used against sb
话柄 [ huà bǐng ]: a pretext for gossip; a matter for derision
笑柄 [ xiào bǐng ]: a matter for ridicule; an object of ridicule; laughingstock
权柄 [ quán bǐng ]: authority
手柄 [ shǒu bǐng ]: handle; video game controller
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 丙 [ bǐng ] third; 3rd heavenly stem
heisig_chinese_memo: In third class everything is handled using wooden products to save money.  Wooden headphones, wooden seats, wooden tray tables etc.
heisig_constituent: design, tree, wood, third class, one, ceiling, inside, person, belt
Keyword_KANJIDIC: design, pattern, build, nature, handle, crank, grip, knob, shaft
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: дизайн, рисунок, сборка, природа, ручка, кривошип, сцепление, ручка, вал
koohiiStory1: This is a "design" as in a "pattern", not a verb as in "to design". The tree grain design was too expensive for the third class airline to use for the panelling. They just painted it.
jp_example_words:
間柄(あいだがら): relation(ship)
柄(え): handle, grip
大柄(おおがら): large build, large pattern
小柄(こがら): short (build)
事柄(ことがら): matter, thing, affair, circumstance
人柄(ひとがら): personality, character, personal appearance, gentility
柄(がら): pattern, design
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You walk up to a tree and put dynamite on it. Then you set it off. BOOM. It explodes, but doesn't do what you'd expect. Instead of blowing the tree up, it blasts a very beautiful pattern into the side of it as well as the ground around it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Think about what pattern it might be. Is it a checkered pattern? Something more complicated and beautiful? Whatever it is, think of something that really impresses you.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The pattern is so beautiful that you want to put it on your garage (がら). So, you do.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine painting your garage with the pattern you imagined earlier.

bǐng: (сч.слово) (диал.) для объектов с ручками

Kanshudo_mnemonic: the third (丙) tree (木) makes a pattern
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In third class everything is handled using wooden products to save money.  Wooden headphones, wooden seats, wooden tray tables etc.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood " and " C ", it is also used as " pinch ". The original meaning is the handle of an axe, which can generally refer to the handle of a utensil. "Shuowen": "Ke Ye. Congmu, Bingsheng. Fold, or Congbing." Duan Yucai's note: "The original meaning of the handle is exclusively axe, and it is extended to the door of the common handle." ": "Long axe, handle eight feet long."

" Handle " can mean the root. "Mandarin ‧ Qiyu": "Governing the country without losing its handle." Wei Zhao's note: "The handle is the original."

" Handle " can also mean power. "Twenty-Three Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "The son is in power, and there are many benefits. It is both advantageous and powerful, but also holding the people's authority. How can you be afraid?"

" Stalk " can also refer to the part of the plant's flower, leaf or fruit connected to the branch or stem. Southern Song Liu Yiqing's "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Jian Ao": "Soochow Wu has a long-handled pot Lu, can Qing be planted?"

" Handle " also means to hold and control. "Warring States Policy‧Han Ce II": "The Gongzhong handled Master Qin, so he dared to defend Chu."

" Handle " is also a metaphor for being caught in words and deeds. Yuan Liuyi's "General Discussion on Seclusion-Article 8": "It is said that Hu Jun's writing is very strange, and the accusation is so severe that he is afraid that Chen Gong will use this as a means of resignation. The court will ask for it, and the crime will be related."

" Handle " is also used as a quantifier. Tang Li Zhao's "Hanlin Chronicles": "Thirty items of spring clothes are given every year... a large fan made of bamboo by the green group."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and " C ", it is also used as " pinch ". The original meaning is the handle of an axe, which can generally refer to the handle of a utensil.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「丙」聲，又作「棅」，本義為斧柄，可泛指器物的把手。《說文》：「柯也。从木，丙聲。棅，或从秉。」 段玉裁注：「柄之本義專謂斧柯，引伸為凡柄之偁。」《墨子‧備城門》：「長斧，柄長八尺。」

　　「柄」可表示根本。《國語‧齊語》：「治國家不失其柄。」韋昭注：「柄，謂本也。」

　　「柄」也可表示權力。《左傳‧襄公二十三年》：「子在位，其利多矣。既有利權，又執民柄，將何懼焉？」

　　「柄」還可表示植物的花、葉或果實跟枝或莖相連的部分。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧簡傲》：「東吳有長柄壺盧，卿得種來不？」

　　「柄」亦表示執掌、掌握。《戰國策‧韓策二》：「公仲柄得秦師，故敢捍楚。」

　　「柄」還比喻在言行上被人抓住的把柄。元劉壎《隱居通議‧文章八》：「咸謂胡君文筆甚奇，而指摘大切，懼陳公借此以為辭召之柄，則朝廷推求，罪必相及。」

　　「柄」也用作量詞。唐李肇《翰林志》：「每歲內賜春服物三十疋……青團鏤竹大扇一柄。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「丙」聲，又作「棅」，本義為斧柄，可泛指器物的把手。

從「 木 」，「 丙 」聲，又作「 棅 」，本義為斧柄，可泛指器物的把手。《說文》：「柯也。从木，丙聲。棅，或从秉。」 段玉裁注：「柄之本義專謂斧柯，引伸為凡柄之偁。」《墨子‧備城門》：「長斧，柄長八尺。」 「 柄 」可表示根本。《國語‧齊語》：「治國家不失其柄。」韋昭注：「柄，謂本也。」 「 柄 」也可表示權力。《左傳‧襄公二十三年》：「子在位，其利多矣。既有利權，又執民柄，將何懼焉？」 「 柄 」還可表示植物的花、葉或果實跟枝或莖相連的部分。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧簡傲》：「東吳有長柄壺盧，卿得種來不？」 「 柄 」亦表示執掌、掌握。《戰國策‧韓策二》：「公仲柄得秦師，故敢捍楚。」 「 柄 」還比喻在言行上被人抓住的把柄。元劉壎《隱居通議‧文章八》：「咸謂胡君文筆甚奇，而指摘大切，懼陳公借此以為辭召之柄，則朝廷推求，罪必相及。」 「 柄 」也用作量詞。唐李肇《翰林志》：「每歲內賜春服物三十疋……青團鏤竹大扇一柄。」
From the sound of " wood" and " C", it is also used as " pinch". The original meaning is the handle of an axe, which can generally refer to the handle of a utensil. "Shuowen": "Ke Ye. Congmu, Bingsheng. Fold, or Congbing." Duan Yucai's note: "The original meaning of the handle is exclusively axe, and it is extended to the door of the common handle." ": "Long axe, handle eight feet long." " Handle" can mean the root. "Mandarin ‧ Qiyu": "Governing the country without losing its handle." Wei Zhao's note: "The handle is the original." " Handle" can also mean power. "Twenty-Three Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "The son is in power, and there are many benefits. It is both advantageous and powerful, but also holding the people's authority. How can you be afraid?" " Stalk" can also refer to the part of the plant's flower, leaf or fruit connected to the branch or stem. Southern Song Liu Yiqing's "Shi Shuo Xin Yu-Jian Ao": "Soochow Wu has a long-handled pot Lu, can Qing be planted?" " Handle" also means to hold and control. "Warring States Policy‧Han Ce II": "The Gongzhong handled Master Qin, so he dared to defend Chu." " Handle" is also a metaphor for being caught in words and deeds. Yuan Liuyi's "General Discussion on Seclusion-Article 8": "It is said that Hu Jun's writing is very strange, and the accusation is so severe that he is afraid that Chen Gong will use this as a means of resignation. The court will ask for it, and the crime will be related." " Handle" is also used as a quantifier. Tang Li Zhao's "Hanlin Chronicles": "Thirty items of spring clothes are given every year... a large fan made of bamboo by the green group."

柄字的基本解释

柄
bǐng
植物的花、叶或果实跟枝茎连着的部分：叶柄。花柄。
器物上的把儿：刀柄。勺柄。
量词，用于有柄物：一柄伞。
喻在言行上被人抓住的材料：把（b?）柄。话柄。
执掌：柄政（执掌政权）。柄国。
权：国柄。民柄。
根本：“谦，德之柄也”。

柄字的汉语字典释义
柄字的康熙字典解释
柄字的源字形
柄字的起名意思

：指的是器物的把儿；植物的花、叶或果实跟茎枝连着的部分也叫柄。后引申为执掌的意思。

handle
Basic explanation of words
handle
bǐng
The part where the flower, leaf or fruit of a plant is connected to the stem: the petiole. Flower stalk.
The handle on the utensil: the handle of the knife. Spoon handle.
Quantifier, used for objects with handles: an umbrella.
The material that Yu was caught in words and deeds: handle (b?) handle. Talking.
In charge: handle government (in charge of political power). Handle country.
Quan: State handle. Min handle.
Fundamental: "Modest, the handle of virtue."
handle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
handle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
handle
Source glyph
handle
Name meaning
: Refers to the handle of the utensil; the part where the flower, leaf or fruit of a plant is connected to the stem and branch is also called the handle. Later it was extended to mean to be in charge.
bǐng
I сущ. /счётное слово
1) рукоятка; ручка, черенок (также счётное слово для вееров)
斧柄 рукоятка топора, топорище
一柄扇子 один веер
2) бот. черенок; черешок
叶柄 черешок листа
3) зоол. стебелек (у иглокожих моллюсков)
4) повод; тема; предмет
笑柄 повод для смеха
话柄 тема для беседы
5) кормило власти; власть
治国家不失其柄 управлять страной, не выпуская из рук руля
执国之柄 держать в руках кормило власти над страной
6) * корень, основа
德之柄 основа добродетели
II гл.
вм. 秉 (управлять; держать в своих руках)
III собств.
Бин (фамилия)
Radicals: 木, 丙  (tree, dynamite)
Meaning Mnemonic
You walk up to a tree and put dynamite on it. Then you set it off. BOOM. It explodes, but doesn't do what you'd expect. Instead of blowing the tree up, it blasts a very beautiful pattern into the side of it as well as the ground around it.
Think about what pattern it might be. Is it a checkered pattern? Something more complicated and beautiful? Whatever it is, think of something that really impresses you.
Reading Mnemonic
The pattern is so beautiful that you want to put it on your garage (がら). So, you do.
Imagine painting your garage with the pattern you imagined earlier.
